TextView.android:text: She came to the conclusion that that son for whom she would have given her life was simply a man incapable of love. One night, when she had him in her womb, she heard him cry. It was such a definite lament that José Arcadio Buendía woke up Beside him and rejoiced at the idea that the boy was going to be a ventriloquist. Other people predicted that he would be a fortune teller. She, on the other hand, shuddered with the certainty that that deep roar was a first indication of (that).. ... the crying of children in the mother's womb is not an announcement of ventriloquism or divinatory faculty, but an unequivocal sign of incapacity for love.
